conbody.p: Ranking type questions require the students to rank items in the list according to a certain criteria.
These types of question will be presented to the students as shown in .
the Answers tab will contain a list of items on the left and Add and Delete button on the right. Use the buttons to add to or remove items from the list.
Click on the fields in the Answer column to enter or edit the items.
conbody.note: The order in which items appear on the list is the ranking order against which this question will be scored.
